programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Briseann Ribín druma Dhris trí thimpiste. (Ribín breaks Dris' drum by accident.)

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: Déanann Rita agus Crogall teachín nua i ngairdín Mhamó. (Rita and Crocodile build a den in Grandma's garden.)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Is breá le Cory cárta leabharlainne a bheith aige ach nach gcaileann sé leabhar! (Cory is ecstatic to join the library but the excitement is short-lived when he loses a book!)

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard
programme.desc: Tá Streak ag léamh faoi chleasa draíochta ach níl sé in ann iad a dhéanamh! (Streak is reading about magic tricks, but he's not very good at doing them!)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Tá an "Rud Mór Millteach" ag cur faitís ar dhaoine dul ag obair. (The mysterious "Pretty Big Thing" is scaring the people of Pretty Big City from going to work... but what is it?)

programme.title: Zou
programme.desc: Tagann Zou agus Daideo i gcabhair ar Uncail Zavier agus ar Aintín Zelda sa sneachta. (Zou and Grandpa come to the rescue of Uncle Zavier and Aunt Zelda.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Caithfidh na PJ Masks agus Cailín Luna oibriú as lámh a chéile chun stop a chur le Romeo. (The PJ masks and Luna Girl try to stop Romeo.)

programme.title: Finny an Siorc
programme.desc: Tá Finny agus a cuid cairde ag iarraidh dráma a chur ar siúl faoin múinteoir. (Finny's class is making a play about their teacher, Mr. Magellan.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Ceapann Nín go bhfuil a cuid cnaipí caillte aice ach tá bealach ag Wussywat len iad a fháil ar ais. (Ird thinks her buttons are lost forever.)

programme.title: Kazoops
programme.desc: Tá Violet ag iarraidh turas a phleanáil do Stan ach níl Monty in ann é a choinneáil faoi rún. (Violet is planning a surprise getaway for Stan but Monty struggles to keep it a secret.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Is breá le Lola a bheith ag tabhairt aire do chat Mhamó agus Dhaideo. (Lola loves looking after Granny and Grandpa's cat Caspar.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tagann Lola ar bhréagán ar scoil agus níl a fhios aici ar cheart di é a choinneáil. (Lola finds someone else's toy at school and isn't sure if she should keep it or not.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Foghlaimeoidh Nic agus Sailí faoi na cineálacha éagsúla bruscair atá ann ó Dheoirín, an dreancaid trá. (Nick & Sally learn about different types of trash from Sandy the sand-hopper.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Tá speirsheabhac Síneach gafa ag Mo, Joe agus MacTrapp! (MacTrapp, Mo and Joe have caught a Chinese Sparrowhawk using their tornado generators.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Le cúnamh óna chairde, faigheann Ruairí an ceann is fearr ar an bhfaitíos atá air roimh eitilt. (Rodney overcomes his fear of flying with the help of his friends.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Téann muintir Jinks agus Jason ar shaoire champála ach níl maith ar bith ina gcuid airgid ann. (The Jinks family, along with Zak's friend Jason, go on a themed camping holiday.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Tá sé in am ionadaí ranga a roghnú agus tá Aodán, Olivia & Zak san iomaíocht. (It's time to vote for a class representative. Alban, Olivia and Zak are all in the running.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Tá Bean Uí Phluidín sa bhaile tinn agus is í an príomhoide atá chun an lón a réiteach. (When Mrs Blanket is out sick the headmistress takes on the school lunches.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Tá Olive agus Joey ag iarraidh bronntanas iontach a fháil do Yassine dá bhreithlá. (Olive and Joey want to get Yassine the best gift ever for his birthday.)

programme.title: Miraculous
programme.desc: Faigheann Marinette amach go bhfuil sárbhithiúnach ag cur beocht i ndrochbhrionglóidí mhuintir Pháras. (A mysterious super villain is bringing Parisians' bad dreams to life.)

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom
programme.desc: Tuigeann MacAodh anois an drochbhail a bheadh ar Champa Loch Íochtair murach é féin a bheith thart. (McGee experiences what Lakebottom would be like if he never existed.)

programme.title: GAA 2025
programme.desc: Buaicphointí CLG ó chluichí peile agus iomána an deireadh seachtaine. (GAA highlights including football and hurling action.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Caithfidh Kevin agus Wayne a shocrú cé acu a gheobhaidh seomra Karen. (Kevin and Wayne must decide who will move into the room vacated by their sister.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Nuair a dhúnmharaítear úinéir irise is í Jessica a chaithfidh teacht ar an té a rinne é. (Jessica must find out the truth when the ruthless owner of a periodical is murdered.)

programme.title: Domhan an Dúlra
programme.desc: Is iomaí cineál creimire ar domhain idir luchain, francaigh agus níos mó ná dhá mhíle speiceas eile. (Uncover the fascinating world of rodents.)

programme.title: Laochra Gael
programme.desc: Is í Brenda McAnespie, Mhuineacháin, a bheidh faoi chaibidil sa gclár seo. (The story of Brenda McAnespie, who excelled as a footballer.)
